channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster 7.1.4b binaries released
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql/mysql-cluster-7-1-4b-binaries-released#comment-400">LinuxJedi</a>.
Hi Andy - how do I get that?
Cheers, Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to LinuxJedi.

Hi Andy – how do I get that?

Cheers, Andrew.

item.title: By: LinuxJedi
item.dc:creator: LinuxJedi
item.description:
Hi Andrew,
Might be good to get the -n0 changelog too, lots of merges there which don't detail what the fix was :)
